verses.verse: He that is wounded in the <S%H6481>stones<s%>, or has his privy <S%H8212>member<s%> cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

A <S%H4464>bastard<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; even to his <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall he not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

An <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> or <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; even to their <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall they not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>:

<S%H1697>Because<s%> they <S%H6923>met<s%> you not with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, when you came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and because they <S%H7936>hired<s%> against you <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> of <S%H6604>Pethor<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia<s%>, to curse <S%H7043>you<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>; but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H7045>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, because the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> loved <S%H157>you<s%>.
You shall not <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> nor their <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> all your <S%H3117>days<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

You shall not <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H130>Edomite<s%>; for he is your <S%H251>brother<s%>: you shall not <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>; because you were a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in his <S%H776>land<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> that are <S%H3205>fathered<s%> of them shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%>.
When the <S%H4264>host<s%> goes <S%H3318>forth<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, then <S%H8104>keep<s%> you from every <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

If there be among you any <S%H376>man<s%>, that is not <S%H2889>clean<s%> by reason of uncleanness that <S%H7137>chances<s%> him by <S%H3915>night<s%>, then shall he <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, he shall not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>inside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>:

But it shall <S%H6153>be<s%>, when evening comes <S%H6437>on<s%>, he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> himself with <S%H4325>water<s%>: and when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down<s%>, he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>into<s%> the camp <S%H4264>again<s%>.
You shall have a place <S%H3027>also<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, where you shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>:

And you shall have a <S%H3489>paddle<s%> among your <S%H240>weapons<s%>; and it shall <S%H3427>be<s%>, when you will ease yourself <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, you shall <S%H2658>dig<s%> with <S%H7725>it<s%>, and shall turn back and <S%H3680>cover<s%> that which comes from <S%H6627>you<s%>:

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of your <S%H4264>camp<s%>, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>, and to give up your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4264>you<s%>; therefore shall your camp be <S%H6918>holy<s%>: that he <S%H7200>see<s%> no <S%H6172>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> in <S%H7725>you<s%>, and turn away from <S%H310>you<s%>.
You shall not <S%H5462>deliver<s%> unto his <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> which is <S%H5337>escaped<s%> from his master unto <S%H113>you<s%>:

He shall <S%H3427>live<s%> with <S%H7130>you<s%>, even among <S%H4725>you<s%>, in that place which he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, where it pleases him <S%H2896>best<s%>: you shall not oppress <S%H3238>him<s%>.
There shall be no <S%H6948>whore<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, nor a <S%H6945>sodomite<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

You shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H868>hire<s%> of a <S%H2181>whore<s%>, or the <S%H4242>price<s%> of a <S%H3611>dog<s%>, into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for any <S%H5088>vow<s%>: for even <S%H8147>both<s%> these are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

You shall not lend upon <S%H5391>usury<s%> to your <S%H251>brother<s%>; <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%>, <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H400>food<s%>, <S%H5392>usury<s%> of any <S%H1697>thing<s%> that is lent upon <S%H5391>usury<s%>:

Unto a <S%H5237>stranger<s%> you may lend upon <S%H5391>usury<s%>; but unto your <S%H251>brother<s%> you shall not lend upon <S%H5391>usury<s%>: that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all that you <S%H4916>settest<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to in the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H935>go<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

When you shall <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, you shall not <S%H309>slack<s%> to <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>: for the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1875>surely<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> it of <S%H2399>you<s%>; and it would be sin in you.
But if you shall <S%H2308>forbear<s%> to <S%H5087>vow<s%>, it shall be no sin in <S%H2399>you<s%>.

That which is gone <S%H4161>out<s%> of your <S%H8193>lips<s%> you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>perform<s%>; even a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%>, according as you have <S%H5087>vowed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which you have <S%H1696>promised<s%> with your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

When you <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>'s <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, then you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%> your <S%H7648>fill<s%> at your own <S%H5315>pleasure<s%>; but you shall not <S%H5414>put<s%> any in your <S%H3627>vessel<s%>.

When you <S%H935>come<s%> into the standing <S%H7054>corn<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, then you may <S%H6998>pluck<s%> the <S%H4425>ears<s%> with your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; but you shall not <S%H5130>move<s%> a <S%H2770>sickle<s%> unto your <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>'s standing <S%H7054>corn<s%>.
